feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -15.8°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -15.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -19.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or local snow squalls ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
